data.name: Learn Japanese To Survive! Kanji Combat - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains the original soundtrack for Learn Japanese To Survive! Kanji Combat.

With 60 amazing tracks, including the stunning theme song, Courage In Your Heart, this soundtrack is not to be missed!

Also included is the game's closing song, Footprints In The Sand.

All tracks are provided as .mp3 files.

TRACK LIST:

Disc 01
Courage In Your Heart
Footprints In The Sand
Let Destiny Give Way To Your Ambitions
Cast Your Fears Aside
Fight On Behalf Of Those We Lost
Humanity's Unyielding Hope
Ignite Your Soul
Strike At The Soul Of Darkness
The Savior Of Tomorrow
Shatter The False Mirror
The Darkest Night Is The Shadow Of Dawn
Lost In Thought
Remember To Remember
Forbidden River
Many Hands Make Light Work
Bottom Of The Well
Morning Sunlight
Uphill Struggle
Set Your Sights On The Stars
Venturing Across The Vast Unknown

Disc 02
The True Self Contains Unlimited Potential
The Chance To Dream
Soar High, Baby Bird
Dare To Dazzle
Pure-Hearted Thanks
Little Fish In A Big Pond
Noble And Honorable
The Fading Embers Of Yesterday
Survivor's Guilt
Bringer Of Calamity
Calamity Brought Forth
The True Name Of Terror Is...
A Melody For Those We Struggle Alongside
Taking Chances
The Purest Sorrow
Prey
Fear's Chilling Touch
Promise To Return
For Your Convenience
Dangerous Streets

Disc 03
The Forest Queen's Blessing
Fey Lights
Jewel Of The Sands
Follow A Whisper
Your Majesty
Crawling Horrors
Realm Of Shadows
Sunlit Glacier
Ninth Moon
Hallowed Grounds
As One With Shadows
Children Of Melancholy
Remnants Of The Fallen
The Forest King's Curse
Technology's Lament
Artificial Intelligence
Unidentified Fear Of...
Our Greatest Fears Lay Ahead
Courage In Your Heart (Karaoke)
Footprints In The Sand (Karaoke)


[LOCATING YOUR DLC ONCE PURCHASED & DOWNLOADED]

DLC files are downloaded to your game's Steam directory after purchase. The default location is:

\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Learn Japanese To Survive! Kanji Combat\

If this is not valid on your computer, locate your game's install directory using these instructions:

- Open the Steam client and navigate to your game library
- Right-click the entry for Learn Japanese To Survive! Kanji Combat and select Properties
- Click the Local Files tab
- Click Browse Local Files

This will open the game's directory, and once your DLC is installed, you'll be able to view the files.

fullgame.name: Learn Japanese To Survive! Kanji Combat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
